sn30.17-46:3.1: 17–46 How Giving Helps to Become Womb-Born, etc.
sn30.17-46:4.2: Seated to one side, that mendicant said to the Buddha:
sn30.17-46:4.3: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the womb-born phoenixes …
sn30.17-46:7.1: The Linked Discourses on phoenixes are complete.
